SEARCH

Unnamed Package

  • Class
    Description
    App
    Main application entry-point class (formerly LabRunner).
    ISenetencePart
    A marker interface for classes that can be part of a Sentence, such as Word or Punctuation.
    Letter
    Represents a single letter (character).
    Punctuation
    Represents a single punctuation mark.
    Sentence
    Represents a sentence, composed of a list of ISentencePart objects (which can be Words or Punctuation).
    Text
    Represents a full text, composed of a list of Sentence objects.
    TextOperationService
    A service class that contains the core business logic for processing Text and Word objects.
    TextParser
    A utility class for parsing a raw string into a Text object.
    Word
    Represents a single word, composed of a list of Letter objects.
